questions.question: Your team needs to track and audit the complete lineage of a machine learning model, from data ingestion to deployment. Which combination of AWS services should you use?
options: SageMaker Lineage Tracking and SageMaker Model Registry
SageMaker Feature Store and AWS Glue
correct_answers: SageMaker Lineage Tracking and SageMaker Model Registry
questions.Practice test: AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer Associate: Hands On!
